issue.title: [Java][Dataset] Allow passing empty columns for projection
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13257](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13257). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Projecting on empty columns (functionally like a pure metadata query on source of data) was supported in C++ Dataset API in ARROW-11174. This is to align Java API's behavior within C++.
